market_context: Consumer sentiment data missed expectations. Oil prices fell 1.2% on demand concerns. Nvidia earnings expectations are building. Dollar strengthened slightly against major currencies.

predictions.reasoning: Despite soft consumer data, dip buyers have consistently defended the 600 level on SPY. Light trading volume suggests consolidation more likely than sharp moves.
Multiple analyst upgrades circulating pre-market. Earnings run-up historically averages 8% in the 5 days before Nvidia reports. Momentum is strongly positive.
Crude oil down on weak demand outlook from China PMI data. Energy stocks typically track oil prices same day. ExxonMobil at resistance near 52-week high.
Microsoft Azure cloud growth continues to outpace estimates. Copilot monetization updates expected at upcoming developer conference. Consolidation above 410 support looks constructive.
Dow industrials lagging amid manufacturing weakness signals. Boeing drag persists. Consumer confidence miss weighs on cyclicals that dominate the Dow composition.
